author: José Pedro Ferreira and Maarten Janssen and Gladis Barcellos de Oliveira and Margarita Correia and Gilvan Müller de Oliveira
title: The Common Orthographic Vocabulary of the Portuguese Language: a set of open lexical resources for a pluricentric language
booktitle: Proceedings of the Eighth International Conference on Language Resources and Evaluation (LREC-2012)
editor: Nicoletta Calzolari and Khalid Choukri and Thierry Declerck and Mehmet Uğur Doğan and Bente Maegaard and Joseph Mariani and Jan Odijk and Stelios Piperidis
